document.docTitle: Hemilamprops chilensis Gerken & Haye 2018, sp. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: Hemilamprops chilensis sp. nov. (Crustacea: Cumacea: Lampropidae) from the coast of Chile, with a key to the Chilean Lampropidae and remarks on the status of H. ultimaespei Zimmer, 1921 and H. lotusae Băcescu, 1969

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Hemilamprops chilensis sp. nov. (Crustacea: Cumacea: Lampropidae) from the coast of Chile, with a key to the Chilean Lampropidae and remarks on the status of H. ultimaespei Zimmer, 1921 and H. lotusae Băcescu, 1969

: SUbAdULT fEMALE, 4.7 MM, dISSEcTEd, MNHNCL CUM 11849 , PELLUcO BEAcH,

CHILE
, 41°29.52'S , 72°54.32'W , 19– 20 M.

CHILE
, BAHIA HERRAdURA TO ANcUd, CHILOé ISLANd .

paragraph.emphasis: Holotype subadult female, 4.7 mm , MNHNCL CUM 11849 .

subSubSection.paragraph: PSEUdOROSTRAL LObES 0.4 cARAPAcE LENgTH, EYELObE 0.1 cARAPAcE LENgTH, WITHOUT dISTINcT LENSES, ANTENNAL NOTcH AbSENT, VENTRAL MARgIN SMOOTH, INcOMPLETE LATERAL RIdgE EXTENdINg fROM cENTER Of ANTERIOR MARgIN HALf cARAPAcE LENgTH, ANTERIOR HALf Of cARAPAcE WITH SHARP dORSAL fOLd, cARAPAcE EqUAL TO THORAcIc SEgMENTS TOgETHER ( FIg. 1A, B ).

ANTENNA RUdIMENTARY, Of 4 ARTIcLES, SUbEqUAL IN LENgTH TO PEdUNcLE Of ANTENNULE ; ARTIcLE 1 WITH 2 STOUT PAPPOSE SETAE ; ARTIcLE 2 WITH 1 STOUT PAPPOSE SETA ; ARTIcLE 3 WITH 1 SMALL SETA ; ARTIcLE 4 WITH SEVERAL SIMPLE SETAE TERMINALLY ( FIg. 2C ).
MANdIbLE NOT EXAMINEd fOR fEMALE.
MAXILLULE NOT EXAMINEd fOR fEMALE.

MAXILLA WITH THREE ENdITES; bROAd ENdITE dISTAL MARgIN WITH MANY SIMPLE ANd PAPPOSE SETAE , MEdIAL MARgIN WITH ROW Of 19 SETAE , 1 SETA SET AbOVE ROW ; INNER NARROW ENdITE WITH 4 MIcROSERRATE SETAE TERMINALLY ; OUTER NARROW ENdITE WITH 5 MIcROSERRATE SETAE TERMINALLY ; NARROW ENdITES EXTENd bEYONd dISTAL MARgIN Of bROAd ENdITE ( FIg. 2F ).

MAXILLIPEd 1 bASIS PROdUcEd dISTALLY AS bLUNT LObE, MEdIAL MARgIN WITH ROW Of STOUT SIMPLE SETAE , dISTAL MARgIN WITH PAPPOSE SETAE , PROXIMAL fAcE WITH fIELd Of SMALL SIMPLE SETAE ; IScHIUM AbSENT; MERUS WITH 1 PLUMOSE SETA AT dISTAL cORNER; cARPUS WITH 1 LONg PLUMOSE SETA AT dISTAL cORNER, MEdIAL fAcE LINEd WITH SIMPLE , cOMb, ANd PAPPOSE SETAE ; PROPOdUS SMALL , bEARINg fEW SIMPLE ANd PAPPOSE SETAE dISTALLY; dAcTYL REdUcEd, bEARINg 4 SIMPLE SETAE TERMINALLY ( FIg. 2H ).
MAXILLIPEd 2 NOT EXAMINEd fOR fEMALE.

PEREOPOd 2 bASIS SHORTER THAN ALL OTHER ARTIcLES TOgETHER, MARgINS bEARINg PAPPOSE SETAE , 2 MIcROSERRATE SETAE AT dISTAL cORNER; IScHIUM PRESENT , bEARINg 1 MIcROSERRATE, 1 PLUMOSE ANd 1 SIMPLE SETA ; MERUS SHORTER THAN cARPUS, bEARINg SEVERAL PLUMOSE ANd 1 MIcROSERRATE SETAE ; cARPUS bEARINg STOUT MIcROSERRATE SETAE ANd SIMPLE SETAE ; PROPOdUS 0.25 cARPUS LENgTH, bEARINg 1 SIMPLE SETA ; dAcTYL 3 TIMES PROPOdUS LENgTH, bEARINg fEW SIMPLE SETAE , TERMINAL SETA LENgTH UNKNOWN, bROKEN; EXOPOd PRESENT , 0.9 bASIS LENgTH, fLAgELLUM bEARINg PLUMO-ANNULATE SETAE ( FIg. 3C ).

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 1 .
Hemilamprops chilensis
n. sp .
Holotype subadult female, 4.7 mm, MNHNCL CUM 11849, A, side view; B, dorsal view; C, telson and uropods. Paratype subadult male, 4.5 mm, MNHNCL CUM 11848, D, side view; E, telson and uropods; F, pleopod 1. Scale bars full body 1.0 mm, all others 0.1 mm.

FIGURE 2.
Hemilamprops chilensis
n. sp .
Holotype subadult female, 4.7 mm, MNHNCL CUM 11849, A, antennule; C, antenna; F, maxilla; H, maxilliped 1. Paratype subadult male, 4.5 mm, MNHNCL CUM 11848, B, antennules; D, antenna; E, maxillule; G, mandible; I, maxilliped 2. Scale bars 0.1 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph: TELSON 1.3 TIMES LENgTH Of PLEONITE 6, bEARINg 2 PAIRS MIcROSERRATE SETAE LATERALLY , 3 MIcROSERRATE SETAE TERMINALLY , MARgINS WEAKLY SERRATE ( FIg. 1C ).
PARATYPE SUbAdULT MALE, 4.5 MM, MNHNCL CUM 11848.

PSEUdOROSTRAL LObES 0.4 cARAPAcE LENgTH, EYELObE 0.07 cARAPAcE LENgTH, WITHOUT dISTINcT LENSES; ANTENNAL NOTcH AbSENT; VENTRAL MARgIN SMOOTH; INcOMPLETE LATERAL RIdgE EXTENdINg fROM cENTER Of ANTERIOR MARgIN HALf cARAPAcE LENgTH, ANTERIOR HALf Of cARAPAcE WITH SHARP dORSAL fOLd, cARAPAcE EqUAL TO THORAcIc SEgMENTS TOgETHER ( FIg. 1D ).
ANTENNA IMMATURE, Of 3 ARTIcLES, ARTIcLES 1 ANd 2 WITH fEW PLUMOSE SETAE ( FIg. 2D ).
MANdIbLE NAVIcULAR, WITH ROW Of 9 OR 10 LIfTINg SETAE ( FIg. 2G ).
MAXILLULE WITH 2 ENdITES; OUTER ENdITE WITH dOUbLE ROW Of STOUT SETAE dISTALLY; INNER ENdITE WITH 5 SETAE TERMINALLY ; PALP WITH 2 SETAE ( FIg. 2E ).
MAXILLA , MAXILLIPEd 1 NOT EXAMINEd fOR MALE .

MAXILLIPEd 3 bASIS LONgER THAN ALL OTHER ARTIcLES TOgETHER, dISTAL MARgIN LINEd WITH fINE HAIR-LIKE SETAE, dISTAL cORNER PROdUcEd SLIgHTLY ANd bEARINg 2 LONg STOUT PLUMOSE SETAE, MEdIAL MARgIN bEARINg SEVERAL PAPPOSE SETAE; IScHIUM PRESENT, UNARMEd; MERUS 0.7 cARPUS LENgTH, bEARINg 3 PAPPOSE SETAE; cARPUS bEARINg 1 PLUMOSE SETA dISTALLY,
ROW Of PAPPOSE ANd SIMPLE SETAE MEdIALLY, MEdIAL MARgIN PROdUcEd AS 2 TEETH
; PROPOdUS SLENdER, 0.9 cARPUS LENgTH, bEARINg SIMPLE ANd PLUMOSE SETAE; dAcTYL 0.3 PROPOdUS LENgTH, bEARINg fEW SIMPLE SETAE, STOUT TERMINAL SETA 3.0 dAcTYL LENgTH; EXOPOd PRESENT, 0.8 bASIS LENgTH, fLAgELLUM bEARINg PLUMOSE SETAE ( FIg. 4A ).

PEREOPOd 1 bASIS NEARLY LENgTH Of NEXT 4 ARTIcLES TOgETHER, bEARINg MANY PAPPOSE SETAE , VENTRAL MARgIN PROdUcEd AS TEETH dISTALLY; IScHIUM SMALL , bEARINg 1 PLUMOSE SETA ; MERUS SUbEqUAL TO cARPUS, bEARINg SEVERAL PLUMOSE SETAE dISTALLY; cARPUS UNARMEd; PROPOdUS 0.5 bASIS LENgTH, bEARINg fEW SIMPLE SETAE ; dAcTYL EqUAL TO PROPOdUS, bEARINg SEVERAL SIMPLE SETAE , TERMINAL SETA 0.8 LENgTH Of dAcTYL; EXOPOd PRESENT , 0.8 bASIS LENgTH, fLAgELLUM bEARINg PLUMO-ANNULATE SETAE ( FIg. 4B ).
PLEOPOdS IMMATURE, ENdOPOd Of 1 ARTIcLE, PROdUcEd AS PROcESS MEdIALLY, EXOPOd Of 2 ARTIcLES ( FIg. 1F ).
TELSON 2.2 TIMES LENgTH Of PLEONITE 6, bEARINg 2 PAIRS Of MIcROSERRATE SETAE LATERALLY , 3 MIcROSERRATE SETAE TERMINALLY ( FIg. 1E ).

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 3 .
Hemilamprops chilensis
n. sp .
Holotype subadult female, 4.7 mm, MNHNCL CUM 11849, A, maxilliped 3; B, pereopod 1; C, pereopod 2; D, pereopod 3; E, pereopod 4; F, pereopod 5. Scale bars 0.1 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph: UROPOd PEdUNcLES 1.25 TELSON LENgTH, bEARINg 10 OR 11 MIcROSERRATE SETAE MEdIALLY, PEdUNcLES SUbEqUAL TO EXOPOd. UROPOd ENdOPOd Of THREE ARTIcLES; ARTIcLE 1 1.2 TIMES LENgTH Of ARTIcLES 2 ANd 3 TOgETHER, MEdIAL MARgIN bEARINg 12 OR 13 MIcROSERRATE SETAE , dISTAL MARgIN bEARINg 1 SIMPLE SETA , MEdIAL MARgIN STRONgLY SERRATE ; ARTIcLE 2 EqUAL TO ARTIcLE 3, bEARINg 4 MIcROSERRATE SETAE MEdIALLY, 1 SIMPLE SETA dISTALLY, MEdIAL MARgIN STRONgLY SERRATE ; ARTIcLE 3 bEARINg 3 MIcROSERRATE SETAE MEdIALLY, MEdIAL MARgIN STRONgLY SERRATE , TERMINAL SETA SIMPLE , LENgTH ESTIMATEd. UROPOd EXOPOd Of 2 ARTIcLES, 0.9 ENdOPOd LENgTH; ARTIcLE 1 SUbEqUAL TO ARTIcLE 2, bEARINg fEW SIMPLE SETAE ; ARTIcLE 2 bEARINg MULTIPLE SIMPLE SETAE , TERMINAL SETA LENgTH ESTIMATEd ( FIg. 1E ).

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 4 .
Hemilamprops chilensis
n. sp .
Paratype subadult male, 4.5 mm, MNHNCL CUM 11848, A, maxilliped 3; B, pereopod 1; C, pereopod 2; D, pereopod 3; E, pereopod 4; F, pereopod 5. Scale bars 0.1 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Etymology . THE SPEcIES IS NAMEd
chilensis
fOR THE cOUNTRY Of cOLLEcTION.

Remarks .
Hemilamprops chilensis
sp. nov.
IS cLEARLY A MEMbER Of THE gENUS
Hemilamprops
, AS THE cARAPAcE IS NOT dORSOVENTRALLY fLATTENEd, THE MALE bEARS THREE PAIRS Of PLEOPOdS, ANd THE bASIS Of THE fIRST PEREOPOd IS dISTINcTLY SHORTER THAN THE REST Of THE APPENdAgE.

THE SPEcIES WITH THE MOST SIMILAR cARAPAcE IS
Hemilamprops glabrus
DAY 1978 fROM SOUTH AfRIcA , bUT THE NEW SPEcIES IS dIffERENTIATEd bY THE MAXILLIPEd 3 bASIS bEINg LONgER THAN THE REST Of THE APPENdAgE ANd THE TELSON bEARINg 3 TERMINAL SETAE ANd TWO PAIRS Of LATERAL SETAE ON THE TELSON . IN
H. glabrus
THE bASIS Of MAXILLIPEd 3 IS SHORTER THAN THE REST Of THE APPENdAgE, ANd THE TELSON bEARS fIVE TERMINAL SETAE ANd NO LATERAL SETAE .

THE ONLY SPEcIES Of
Hemilamprops
PREVIOUSLY REcORdEd fROM THE cOAST Of
CHILE
IS
H. ultimaespei ZIMMER
, 1921, fROM TIERRA dEL FUEgO. THE ORIgINAL fIgURES fROM ZIMMER (1921: fIg. 1–3) ARE NOT VERY dETAILEd. THE NEW SPEcIES,
H. chilensis ,
cAN bE dIffERENTIATEd fROM
H. ultimaespei
bY THE PRESENcE Of A SMALL LATERAL RIdgE ANTERIORLY ON THE cARAPAcE.
